Are they pure in all their habits? Have you instructed them in the principles of moral purity? If you have neglected to teach them line upon 


                                      -145- 

line, precept upon precept, here a little and there a little, let not another day pass without confessing to them your neglect to do this. Then tell them that you mean now to do your God-appointed work. Ask them to take hold with you in the reform. Let each help the other in the performance of duty.
